Key Match Events: Shadab Khan's all-round excellence helped Pakistan win
Shadab Khan scored 52 from just 22 deliveries
Anrich Nortje took the wicket of Shadab Khan
Mohammad Wasim was dismissed by Anrich Nortje
Shaheen Shah Afridi snared Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw
Temba Bavuma was caught behind for 36 off 19 balls
Aiden Markram was bowled by Shadab Khan
South Africa lost wickets at regular intervals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan had beaten South Africa on all three previous meetings in the competition
South Africa's win over the Netherlands on Sunday will guarantee a semi-final spot
Pakistan's prospects of the last four rest on them seeing off Bangladesh and relying on South Africa or India to lose
Others: The match was played under the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern method
South Africa slipped to 108 for nine
The match was reduced to 14 overs due to a shower
